definitions.definition: A person who has never had sexual intercourse, or sometimes, one who has never engaged in any sexual activity at all.
(early Christian Church) a woman noted for religious piety who has never been married.
One who has never used or experienced a specified thing.
definitions.example: I've never eaten tofu before – you could say I'm a tofu virgin.

definitions.definition: Any of several species of gossamer-winged butterflies of the family Lycaenidae.
A female insect producing eggs from which young are hatched, though there has been no fecundation by a male; a parthenogenetic insect.
(usually not comparable) In a state of virginity; chaste, not having had sexual intercourse.
Not yet cultivated, explored, or exploited by humans or humans of certain civilizations.
definitions.example: The virgin lands of the Americas were awaiting the Europeans.

definitions.definition: Of olive oil, obtained by mechanical means, so that the oil is not altered.
(usually not comparable) Of mixed drinks, not containing alcohol.
